authors.author: George F. Root William O. Cushing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Glory! Glory! How the angels sing! newline Glory! Glory! How the loud harps ring! newline 'Tis the ransomed army, like a mighty sea, newline Pealing forth the anthem of the free.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ring the bells of heaven! newline There is joy today, newline For a soul returning from the wild! newline See the Father meets Him out upon the way, newline Welcoming His weary wand'ring child.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ring the bells of heaven! newline There is joy today, newline For the wand'rer now is reconciled. newline Yes a soul is rescued from His sinful way, newline And is born anew a ransomed child.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ring the bells of heaven! newline Spread the feast today! newline Angels swell the glad triumphant strain! newline Tell the joyful tidings; newline Bear it far away! newline For a precious soul is born again.
